Title: Windows Phone ZoomTextbox
Description: The Windows Phone ZoomTextbox Control is an open-source project built on top of the Microsoft Windows phone  7.1 . It is a effort that provides input values with a zoom font size. It's developed in C# with .NET
HomeWiki:
What is the Windows Phone ZoomTextbox Control?

The Windows Phone ZoomTextbox Control is an open-source project built on top of the Microsoft Windows phone  7.1 . It is a effort that provides input values on  a zoom font size. It's developed in C# with .NET
